command.label: Command
command.tooltip: The Command to create your Clip.

bot_response.label: Bot Response
bot_response.tooltip: The Message the Bot will give after it was triggered through !clip.

permission.label: Permission Level
permission.tooltip: Choose, who can trigger your command.

cooldown.label: Cooldown
cooldown.tooltip: Choose the cooldown for your command.

devWeb.label: Visit my Readme
devWeb.tooltip: Opens your browser and loads the Readme on GitHub.

Twitch-Token.label: Twitch-Token
Twitch-Token.tooltip: Your Access-Token for your Twitch Account. To get one, click the button below.

btn-Twitch-Token.label: Get your Twitch-Token
btn-Twitch-Token.tooltip: Your Access-Token for your Twitch Account.
